casebody.data:
Jose A. ESTELA
v.
BRISTOL HOSPITAL, INC. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Joseph B. Burns, in support of the petition.

Michael G. Rigg, in opposition.

The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 165 Conn.App. 100, 138 A.3d 1042 (2016), is denied.
